title: Amusing numbers
text:
Amusing numbers are numbers consisting only of digits 5 and 6. Given an integerk, display thek-th amusing number.InputThe first line consists of integerNrepresenting number of test cases.NextNlines consist ofNintegers (1 ≤k≤ 1015).OutputNlines each displaying correspondingk-th amusing number.ExampleInput:2
1
5Output:5
65
